title: NY Giants Don Martindale on offending Joe Burrow, the hilarious Darnay Holmes video
itunes:title: NY Giants Don Martindale on offending Joe Burrow, the hilarious Darnay Holmes video
description:
New York Giants defensive coordinator Don "Wink" Martindale talks to The Volume's Mike Silver to discuss his team's incredible 6-1 start to the 2022 season and the culture change behind it, then previews the Giants' challenging Week 8 matchup against the Seattle Seahawks. Martindale tells us about his professional career which started in trucking and later included teaching high school economics, and the scheme that got him his first coaching job. He discusses his unique relationship with legendary Oakland Raiders owner Al Davis, why he let Marcus Peters call the defensive plays in a preseason game, how the media misused his words to offend Joe Burrow, and what's actually happening in a very questionable-looking video of Giants cornerback Darnay Holmes. #volume #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
